name: Area 51 (save baby alien)
description:
This game was made for the Area 51 GameDevMotivation Jam #2. Every single thing about this game (code, art, music, sound fx, etc) was made by me within the time frame of the jam. 

Now, here's what you should know before playing the game:

You have to save the baby alien, that is, the green thing that kind of glows.  You have 4 characters with different skills.

Naruto runner - Runs fast and is hard to hit by bullets.

Anti-Vax kid - He can spit on enemies and kill them with his diseases. 

Flat-earther - He is fat and strong and can break walls with his  head.

Machete - He is strong and kills soldiers with his machete.

Controllers:

Left click to select a character.

Shift + left click to select more than 1 character

Mouse wheel scroll for zooming in and out

Mouse wheel press for browsing the map

Right click to move, attack or break a wall.

num 1 takes you to Naruto runner.

num 2 takes you to Anti Vax

num 3 takes you to Flat-earther

num 4 takes you to Machete

Thanks for playing and have fun!
